channel.title: [PI] HELP! Need help solving my Drops [PI]
channel.description:
Okay Guys, me and a friend of mine have decided to start our own server, and we have been coding non stop for the past 3 days, we are both fairly new to the coding so as we learn, we then implement what we have learned into our server, and by doing this we have got pretty far. Up until now i have been able to fix EVERY single problem i wanted to, just be reaserching on the internet, but today the day we aimed to have our server up, Live and Running, we turned to try and solve one of the final problems we had, which was the NPC drop's not being correct.
I Have been searching guides, and trying new things for almost 8 hours now, and still i cant managed to fix this.
The problem is that, NPC's do not drop items that they are supposed to 100%, for example, Green Dragon does not drop D Hide and D Bones. Would any of you experianced coders please take a minute to help me out with this? would be so greatly appreciated!!! my skype is: faris_mckay I need help asap please, just add me and i will instantly accept.
Thanks In Advance!
Skype: faris_mckay

item.description:
@InsidiaX wrote:

Funnily enough i dident add any of those lines. i dont know why Fury was a constant for Man, so i just removed it… Please can you add me on skype so we can do this properly?

So it says something like
NPCIDTABITEM ID

If so, then one of the drops in there were coded wrong and you will probably have to just do it from scratch
